function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Operating HVAC systems as usual during an outbreak","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases through the ventilation system","Mitigation":"Adjusting ventilation and air handling unit operations to reduce the spread of viruses","Technologies":"HVAC system controls, CO2 sensors, ventilation dampers","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management, building owners"},{"Description":"Use of air handling units with recirculation and inadequate filtration","Impact":"Ineffective removal of virus particles from indoor air","Mitigation":"Switching to 100% outdoor air and proper filtration of virus particles","Technologies":"HEPA filters, outdoor air dampers, air handling unit controls","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management, building owners"},{"Description":"Turning off toilet ventilation systems during the outbreak","Impact":"Increased risk of fecal-oral transmission route for contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Continuous operation of toilet ventilation systems to minimize transmission risk","Technologies":"Toilet ventilation system controls, 24/7 operation scheduling","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management, building owners"}]}
